profile: I am a berlin-based software developer graduated in architecture in 2016 from the Polytechnic University of Valencia. In mid-2019 I discovered and took my first steps in the field of web development and software development.

Passionate about the details, as a software developer I enjoy writing clean and efficient code that translates into attractive and functional interfaces with modern frameworks. My 5-year experience as an architect not only has taught me the design and project development principles but also team work, the collective ownership of projects and empathy to share my experience and knowledge with my team and continue progressing.
When I am not in front of the computer, I am probably enjoying a good book, learning new things, going for a run or simply hanging out with friends.

tasks: REST API development with PHP and Symfony
Quality assurance automated tests as well as conduction of code reviews.
Teamwork in an international and multidisciplinary environment with flat team hierarchie and collective ownership of the projects.
Workflow in architecture competitions similar to agile methodology.
Website management with tasks such as updating the project or writing and publishing articles.
Frequent business trips to visit construction sites in different countries of the European Union.
Permanent contact with contractors and disciplines coordination.
3d modelling and rendering with Rhino 3d, vray and video-renderings with Lumion.

education.title: Msc. Development of Websites and Web Applications

skills.label: Libraries & Frameworks
skills.content: React, Next, Node, Sass, Jest, Cypress, D3js, Symfony

skills.label: Tools
skills.content: Git(GitHub & GitLab), MongoDB, Heroku, Firebase, Postman

hobbies: Reading, graphic design, new technologies, basketball, ski, coding, running.
